Package com.Game.view

Class CommandPromptView

java.lang.Object
com.Game.view.CommandPromptView
public class CommandPromptView extends Object
Handles user input through the command line. This class is responsible for gathering commands and input from the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CommandPromptView()
    Default constructor initializes the scanner.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandPromptView

      public CommandPromptView()
      Default constructor initializes the scanner.

  • Method Details

    • getGameModeSelection

      public int getGameModeSelection()
      Gets a game mode selection from the user.
      Returns:
      The selected mode (1 for single player, 2 for tournament)

    • getTournamentCommand

      public String getTournamentCommand()
      Gets a tournament command from the user with guided input. This breaks down the tournament command into parts for easier input.
      Returns:
      The complete tournament command as a string

    • getYesNoResponse

      public boolean getYesNoResponse(String message)
      Gets a yes/no response for a simplified tournament setup.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display
      Returns:
      true for yes, false for no

    • getQuickTournamentSetup

      public String getQuickTournamentSetup()
      Gets a tournament setup with default settings or custom options.
      Returns:
      The tournament command as a string

    • getCommand

      public String getCommand()
      Prompts the user to enter a command and returns the input.
      Returns:
      The user's command input as a string

    • getPlayerOrder

      public String getPlayerOrder(String p_playerName, int p_remainingArmies)
      Gets the next deploy order from a player or checks if they want to finish.
      Parameters:
      p_playerName - The name of the player issuing orders
      p_remainingArmies - The number of remaining armies the player can deploy
      Returns:
      The player's order as a string

    • getConfirmation

      public boolean getConfirmation(String p_message)
      Gets confirmation from the user.
      Parameters:
      p_message - The message to display when requesting confirmation
      Returns:
      true if the user confirms, false otherwise

    • getFilename

      public String getFilename(String p_prompt)
      Gets a filename from the user.
      Parameters:
      p_prompt - The prompt to display when requesting a filename
      Returns:
      The filename entered by the user

    • getInteger

      public int getInteger(String p_prompt)
      Gets an integer value from the user.
      Parameters:
      p_prompt - The prompt to display when requesting an integer
      Returns:
      The integer entered by the user, or -1 if input is invalid

    • getString

      public String getString(String p_prompt)
      Gets a string value from the user.
      Parameters:
      p_prompt - The prompt to display when requesting a string
      Returns:
      The string entered by the user

    • closeScanner

      public void closeScanner()
      Closes the scanner to prevent resource leaks. This should be called when the application is terminating.
